what i do

In my past life I was an eterprise project manager, now I enjoy full stack programming

about

My top expertise is the things that make the web work (HTML, CSS & Javascript) specializing in helping SMBs actualize their vision in the ecommerce space.

I have 12 years of experience at the intersection of business and technology. In my last role I spent six years as a Project Manager for a fortune 500 generating roughly $1 million in revenue for the division annually â€” now I freelance as a full stack developer.

past works

SES CMS Prototype

React prototype website for Solar Electric Supply to save on costs from getting off of improperly configured Magento v1 ecommerce instance. Data migrated/recaptured via web scraping

Proposal was not accepted, but small demo built with React & Strapi Headless CMS.

EV Detroit

CMS-backed website for a modern day performance speed shop for electric vehicle owners and enthusiasts

Created with 11ty, hosted on Netlify, connected to Netlify CMS for managing services & updating site data

Badass Birthkeeper

CMS-backed website & blog platform for practicing doula w/ 10 years Labor and delivey experince.

Two-site implementation with 11ty, hosted on Netlify, connected to Netlify CMS for creating blogs, offerings, and other data and blog SEO-first data model

Goods4goodmarket

eCommerce Shopify solution for a company that focuses on products that have a positive impact on our planet & people's lives.

included website setup, theme customization & SEO

Real-time PWA

React Native Certified Progressive Web Application to help maintain safe social distancing capacities inside buildings

PWA built with Nodejs, express, and socketIO that persists to a local postgres database on my Ubuntu Linode Server running NGINX

ZTM React Course Keystone Project

React ecommerce app connected to postgres

Built with React front end with Nodejs, express, and socketIO that persists to a local postgres database on my Ubuntu Linode Server running NGINX
